text: Protecting our health and well as our freedoms: I believe in the importance of personal responsibility and individual liberties. While we must take necessary precautions to prevent the spread of Covid-19, I'm concerned about overreach from the government. Let's focus on education, not coercion. Wear masks, practice social distancing, and get vaccinated when it's your turn. Together, we can navigate this challenge while preserving our cherished values.
